Are you frustrated with poor quality of your current VPS host? Perhaps your VPS is running slowly, or becomes unavailable at several times of the day due to an overloaded network? Maybe you are not being allocated the RAM you paid for due to overselling? Well, check out ShoveHost! We do not overload our servers and use a premium datacenter (not ColoCrossing).

ShoveHost, which is a legally operated sole proprietorship in California, USA. Here is some more information:

Our VPS host nodes use Intel Xeon E3-1270v2 CPUs, DDR3 ECC RAM, and four WD RE4 disks in LSI Hardware RAID10 with BBU. If you have any questions regarding our service please ask here or email us at sales@shovehost.com
